On Wed, Dec 7, 2016 at 12:17 PM, nubbel ***@***.***> wrote: @fventer <https://github.com/fventer> Apparently, this landed in master as of 7942860 <7942860> . The exported *SavedModel* (similar to SessionBundle) can then be served using tensorflow/serving with the --use_saved_model=true option. I can confirm it's working great! Thanks @davidsoergel <https://github.com/davidsoergel>! 🎉 — You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
